meanings.sent1: The artist used ecru to paint the sandy beach scene.
meanings.sent2: The walls were painted in a calming ecru shade.
meanings.sent3: The ecru color of the paint made the room feel like a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the color of ecru clouds at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The ecru hue of the fabric reminded her of warm sand under her feet.

meanings.sent1: The ecru sweater matched perfectly with her favorite jeans.
meanings.sent2: The old photograph had faded to an ecru tone over the years.
meanings.sent3: The ecru shade of the walls made the room feel like a vintage movie set.
meanings.sent4: The ecru leaves rustled in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent5: The ecru fur of the kitten was soft as a cloud.
